name: Three Nights at Frosty's
description:
Welcome to Frosty's Ice Cream World!

Local milk bar looking for night guard patrolling from midnight-6 am.

Scratch Version: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/411701865/

Monitor cameras, ensure safety to equipment and animatronic characters.

Frosty- appears from your right, close the right door when you see his silver eyes at the door.
Jolly- appears from your left, close the left door when you see her silver eyes at the door.
Kenneth- attacks from your left, watch him from time to time/close the left door when he's not at his stage.
